result.execSummary:
The defendant Chaunte D Ott was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater]. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Chaunte D Ott

9:49 AM Defendant Chaunte D Ott in court.  Attorney Jillian Jean Scheidegger in court for Chaunte D Ott.  Prosecuting attorney Jennifer Flynn in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter Donna Moore. 
Matter scheduled as a status. 
Defense was recently appointed and is seeking another status date. 
BTC: Matter set over for status.
Status conference scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on October 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.
State's NOI to Intro Deft's Statements

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit. It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any alcohol or controlled substances. This is to be monitored through random drug screens and/or breathalyzers by the Racine County Alternatives Program, Room MC340 (Law Enforcement Center 717 Wisconsin Ave Racine WI 53403). New referrals from Court must report on the day of their Court appearance.  Jail releases must report the following business day (M-Fr 8am-4:30pm).  In addition to random testing, the defendant is further ordered to test after each court appearance.

2:06 PM Prosecuting attorney Kelly Larsen in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Chaunte D Ott appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Juan Sebastian Ramirez appeared by video for Chaunte D Ott. Court Reporter Mark Garvin. 
Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.
Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on September 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Initial appearance on June 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
